name: Monstructs: Makers and Mayhem
description:
Monstructs: Makers and Mayhem is a 2-D video game made with custom, pseudo-vector style graphics. It combines, mission-based storytelling, crafting/synthesis and monster collecting to create a unique gaming experience. The main feature of the game is being able to MAKE YOUR OWN MONSTERS!   Build your Army! You get to create 153 Monstructs from 9 different element Castes and four classes of Making difficulty.


  MISSIONS A-GO-GO! Now that you’ve made some friends, send them out into the world to do good for others by completing missions. Some of which you have to guide them to victory!   Evolving Combat System Battles become more challenging the more you play and your Monstructs grow stronger! PLUS SO MUCH MORE!
